movie.title: The Counterfeiters
movie.plot: The story Jewish counterfeiter, Salomon Sorowitsch, coerced into assisting the Nazi operation of the Sachsenhausen concentration camp during World War II.

events.title: the counterfeiters avoid death when their concentration camp is liberated
